greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of C, the coefficient of n*log(n) in the asymptotic formula of Ramanujan for Sum_{k=1..n} (d(k)^2), where d(k) is the number of distinct divisors of k.
link: Ramanujan's Papers, Some formulas in the analytic theory of numbers Messenger of Mathematics, XLV, 1916, 81-84, Formula (3).
formula: C = 36*gamma^2/Pi^2 - (288*z1/Pi^4 + 24/Pi^2)*gamma + (864*z1^2/Pi^6 + 72*z1/Pi^4 - 72/Pi^4*z2 + 6/Pi^2) - 24*g1/Pi^2, where gamma is the Euler-Mascheroni constant A001620, z1 = Zeta'(2) = A073002, z2 = Zeta''(2) = A201994 and g1 is the first Stieltjes constant, see A082633.
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Sep 10 2018
